name: No Fancy Title App
description:
This is my first time joining a game jam, and also my first time trying to create a full game.

But I didn't finished it in time 😥.

I was planned to create a texting app that involves puzzle solving.

The player will have to chat to their friends to keep them (and the player himself/herself) feel better during a home-isolation. If not chatted properly, some will face troubles.

Anyway, the experience I learned is way more important than anything else, and this is what a jam meant to be, right?
